content:
Hello,
Putting a request out to connect with anybody who might have experience with Synthea and/or a FHIR server with Cardio data (i.e. we're trying to run Heart Failure quality measures). We have a cardiac accreditation utility we're trying to dry run, and are looking to test against any servers people may have access to. We know that Synthea includes a Cardio pipeline, and are investigating that this week as well. I'll be here through Friday afternoon.
Abigail

@Abigail Watson I'm in the Connectathon room if you want to chat about any of the Synthea cardio stuff. Some of it is hardcoded, some of it is in the modules that you can browse in the module builder. https://synthetichealth.github.io/module-builder/
Perfect! I'm over in the CCDA Implementationathon, and will stop by in a bit.
Are you in the Connectathon room now? I'm at table 27
